definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The electromagnetic wave is produced by microwave tubes called klystrons.
sentences.chinese: 電磁波是由一種稱爲速調管的微波電子管產生的。

sentences.english: Vacuum tubes require DC voltage sources as well.
sentences.chinese: 真空電子管也要求以直流電壓爲電源。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the advantages of transistors over electron tubes.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述晶體管與電子管相比的優點。

sentences.english: Tube tetrode with directly or indirectly heated cathode.
sentences.chinese: 具有直接或間接加熱的陰極的電子管四極管。

sentences.english: A computer tube can hold a lot more gasoline than a lightbulb.
sentences.chinese: 電腦顯示器的電子管可比小小的燈泡能裝多了。

sentences.english: The influence of fluctuation on an auto-oscillation system of Thomson-type is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論漲落對湯姆生型電子管振盪器的影響。

sentences.english: It felt like I was playing on a tube amp.
sentences.chinese: 感覺就像我是在一個電子管功放播放。

sentences.english: We need to buy auto valve . please with contact us.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要購買汽車電子管，請與我們聯繫。

sentences.english: Configuration vacuum tubes, output power is stable and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 配置真空電子管，輸出功率穩定可靠。
